## gitops suspend

Suspend your GitOps automations

### Examples

```

# Suspend gitops automation
gitops suspend app <app-name>
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for suspend
```

      --namespace string   The namespace scope for this operation (default "wego-system")
